name: lake spot
description: quiet spot on a point by the lake. pretty view

name: Lake camp
description: Pretty spot on reservoir in small gravel lot at top of ramp. some traffic noise

name: Haapakoski
description: Great parking at the river, a shelter with facilities is only 400 meters away

name: Ounasjoki River
description:
Parking and shelter along the Ounasjoki River. Toilets, fireplace and possibility to swim. 4g phone, on and off. 

Gravel road to get here.

name: Alakorkalo parking
description: Parking at the river, 5km south west from Rovaniemi. Shelter with fireplace, you can find firewood at the building with the sigh Puuvaja. In the evening some youngsters were using the fireplace, but further quiet. some traffic noise though.

name: Perälä
description: Forest track that have some spots to pull of at. Might be hard to find a spot for a ground tent due to quite uneven ground.

name: Vaalimaa
description: Finnish border control entering Finland from Rusland. Not much to say. If you got all your documents in order it should run smoothly.

name: Varesjärventie/Pirtintie
description:
Just a forest track with space enough for more or less as many as you might be.

Can be hard to find flat ground. It's not leaning, it's just very uneven.

name: Lake Venjärvi
description: Smallish gravel parking for a small beach at the lake. Some swimmers during the day, deserted at night. Beautiful little lake in the forest.

name: Rajahaudan beach
description: Small beach 8 km north of Oulu, beautiful spot. Some visitors during the day but quiet at night. Big rigs could park at the nearby parking area.

name: Myllykoski
description: Parking, shelter, fireplace and compost toilet. I only stayed here for lunch, but looked like nice place to spend the night. Close to the Verla UNESCO world heritage site

name: Montta campground
description: Nice campground, beside the river. €8 for tent and 2 motorcycles. Kitchen and free showers, there is also a sauna. Friendly owners.

name: Right at Lake Hautakaarre
description: At the end oft the path through the woods you reach a quiet Bank oft lake Hautakaarre. There are some boats, a cabin (locked) and firewood.

name: Lake Pahalampi
description: A quiet and peaceful place besides a trout pond.

name: suolijarvi shore
description: A beautiful place by the lake. there is a little beach and a place to do a fire.

name: Haaskanpera lake
description: A great place with a beautiful view on the lake and a small beach. Access through a grave road.

name: Abc station oil
description: just  to empty chemical WC and take water

name: parking near the zoo
description: parking with sport area. 4 km to the center. quiet by night

name: Koskenniemi Gasthuas Camping
description:
Nice spot by the river 
Grass pitches some with electric
Heated showers and toilets

name: Spot near a beach.
description: Nice spot for one or two Vans, surrounded by blueberries. Just a few meters away from a small beach with toilet.

name: Kangosjarv Lake
description: Nice spot at the lake. No facilities but quiet and pretty.

name: Rest Area
description: Nice rest rea at lake with restroom and tables.

name: Santa Village
description: It's the parking place for Santa Village but you can stay here with your vehicle.

name: Ounaskoski Camping
description: We spent a few days here. The centre of the town is easy walking distance through the main bridge. Well equipped kitchen, tidy grassy areas, restaurant, cafe on site. Very nice view over the river.

name: Camping Atrain
description:
Small(ish) campground at the shores of a beautiful quiet lake. Lots if trees. They have sauna.
You can swimm in the lake, not that cold. You can also walk around the lake, there is a small trail.

name: Campground Korvalan Kestikievari
description: We stayed here for one night. Small and nice campground with lots of free space in Augusr. Grassy sites with electricity right by the lake. IOverlander doesn’t show a lake here, but there is a beautiful lake here. You can just take one of the canoes belonging to the campground and go around the lake.

name: Flakanäs
description: Parking by the beach with spectacular view. Pit toilets and fireplace for cooking. Very nice place.

name: Kerimäki marina parking
description: Nice and quiet big parking lot at the marina of the small village Kerimaki. Pit toilet available.  You can see the world biggest wood church.

name: Koli - ski resort parking
description: Parking of winter station 1.5km after the ferry port. Very quiet. We were alone. Plenty of space.

name: Paltaniemen - beach parking
description: Nice beach and port parking. Very quiet even on weekend. Playground for kids.

name: Ranua zoo camping
description: Campground at 100m from the zoo. All facilities : toilets, shower, sauna, dumpstation, drinking water, playground for kids, kitchen, laundry (3€ per load wash and dry). Very quiet. We paid 25€ for a vehicle and 2 adults and a kid. Electicity is an extra 3€. The visit of the zoo is 17€ per adult and 14 per kids.

name: Tanhuvaara Camping
description: Large sports complex with a recently added camping area, small block of amenities with two showers and two toilets for each. Positioned by a lake but not with a view of the lake unfortunately. Has a lovely little kitchen area and out door grills/bbq’s with wood provided plus lots of seating

name: Vuoksen Kalastuspuisto
description: Small and basic campsite with ageing but clean facilities. 20 or so minutes from border with Russia and a with a lakeside position

name: Parking of the Forest Museum
description: Parking lot. Place enough for several vehicle. Quiet at night. River at 100m, Finish people go to have a bath in the evening.

name: Parking near Lampivaara amethyst mine
description: Big leveled parking lot. 2.6km walking from the mine (worth the visit). Very quiet.

name: kotka camp
description: beautiful camp, great view, nice people.

name: Parking of local Frisbeegolf terrain
description: Quiet place at the parking of the local frisbeegolf place. Cars may be parked here as long a there are frisbeegolfers. No facilities. Next to a road which is not busy. Walking distance (10 minutes) to a nice public (free) swimming spot with diving tower.

name: Koli National Park - very nice waterfront place
description: A very quiet spot next to a dirt road and on the shore of a lake. The small parking spot is slightly sloping. The dirt road is very quiet. Great spot also for a dip in the water or a canoe trip (bring your own equipment).

name: Degersand Resort
description:
This is a small campingground direct on the baltic sea in the south west of the Åland Islands. 
The beach is one of the best in europe. The water is not deep.
It gives a littel restaurant with traditional homemade food. 
The facilities are not great but ok.
When you are not needed electricity you can find your Place in the tent area where you wont.

name: Lakefront by the road
description: A small turnoff on a gravel road gives aces to a flat area about 0.5 meters above the water level. Place enough for 2 campers or perhaps 3 vans. Visible from the road but has minor cover from trees.

name: Boat launch near hiking trail
description: This is a boat launch next to a stairway up into the national park. Should have enough place for 4 vans. The road leading up to it is a dirt road but was doable with a front drive. .

name: Middle of the trail
description:
Widened spot with room for 1,2 vans
No facilities whatsoever

name: Beach parking and co
description: There is a rather large parking lot right outside the beach. It’s not completely isolated but campervans should be fine. The parking lot isn’t that great for tent camping but if one walks out to the beach there is plenty of shelter to hide a tent.

name: Fireplace near a boat launch
description: Driving up here there is a mini shelter (open on one side) with a fireplace and firewood. Continue another 20 meters and you’ll find a boat launch. Should be able to fit around 5 vehicles in total.

name: Campsite at the Ocean
description: Restaurant, kitchen, showers, gas station, WiFi, everything you’d want. Also you can park right next to the beach

name: Small hidden turnoff
description: This turnoff is an abandoned road, it hides you completely from the main road and is quite long so you can fit any amount of vehicles, tent camping is harder as the ground is paved

name: Blueberry stop
description: Just a flat clear that place with a lot of blueberries nearby, if you turn left and keep pushing inward you’ll arrive at some trailheads

name: Tohmo Harbor
description: Nice Place on a smal boatlounch with toilet and firepit.Place for 5 Mobilehome.Easy access.

name: Pihtipudas boat dock
description: A small parking lot next to lake. Quiet place for the night. Cyclists can get to the covered firebit what is at the south end of small gravel path. Go down to the lake from Shell gas station and keep to the south 150 or so meters.

name: Lonely Campingspot next to the lake
description: Next to the Road E24 is a lonely place next to the sea. We camped there by a tent but i think a caravan should be work aswell. You've got the lake for you alone. Enjoy a nice swim in the cold and deep water!

name: Camping Kotkanpesä
description:
it's a nice quiet Camping with a nice view over a lake. It's possible to swim.
The showers and kitchen is ok and clean.
The owner is very nice.

name: Siikajoki Beach
description: Place at a smal boatharbor and a sandy little beach.Many places to stay.Perhaps fee in the season,we stand for free.

name: Big parking place next to the lake & E75
description: A very large gravel parking area right on the lakeside and next to the E75 road. Lots of space with plenty of areas for more privacy.

name: Hiidenkirnut
description: Car park off the Kettestones site just outside Roveniemi. Nice car park, we just pushed into the woods at the side by the picnic table. Has pit toilets and nice trails. 4G on Elisa network.

name: Beach at the River
description:
Sandy Area, right at the River. No firewood but space to light a fire. 
Fits 6-8 Rigs

name: Lokka Forest Camp
description:
Camp in the Woods, of the Beaten Path. 
4WD is not needed to get there but it will help, as well as good Clearance. 
The Spot is not more than the Path and a Grassy Area. Fits approximately one or two Rigs. 
WARNING: Going further into the Woods the Path becomes a narrow swampy ATV Path. Do not go there alone or with decent Recovery Gear.

name: Lake Isojärvi
description:
Beautiful place right next to the Lake, also a flat entrance to the Lake so a nice possibility to swim.

The Area is not flat and stones to level are rare. 

There are two firepits with a hut with firewood. Please make sure to fill up the hut again after you used some wood. 
A trashcan is also on side. 

The Boats at the side are not for the public and should not be used. 
The access is a gravel path. 
It offers space for 3 Rigs or 2 Big Rigs.
Please respect the place and leave it tidy.

name: Kutrinniementie
description: Nice lake spot with ample space. Has a boat launch, changing rooms and a jetty over looking the Lilly pads.

name: Stork Camp
description:
Fire place right next to the street. A hut with Firewood, Axe, paper to light the fire. Also a grill gate. Behind the hut is a pit toilet. 
The area infront is narrow and fits max. 1 Rig. But it's almost level. 
The nearby street is not so busy at night.

name: Katrina
description: Gravel car park in the National Park with many hikes and BBQ areas dotted about.

name: Eckeröline Shipping Port
description:
Come here for shipping from Helsinki to Tallin. I advice Eckeröline since their offer is the cheapest. Also buy your ticket on the website of the shipping company since portals like Check24 are way more expensive. 
Make sure to measure your Rig exactly, they will measure it again at the port.
Be at the port 1h before departure.
Toilets are available in the waiting area.

name: Ski station
description:
At the bottom of a ski slope, just next to a Lapp hut (huge round wooden structure with an equally huge fire place at the center). Wood is provided for free. A river flows about one hundred meters below. Walking trails also nearby. As the village is crowdy with camping-cars, this spot is very quiet. 
If you can not reach the hut with your car (4wd needed), there is a wide parking area next to the river and you can easily walk here. Not accessible during winter time by car.

name: Mixed parking @ Kajaani
description: Parking near the lake, drive a bit further on one of the dirt roads to the spots in the bushes and you are FREE.

name: Flat area with beautiful view
description: Area at the E8, flat no services, but a beautiful view on the river and Sweden. During the night very quiet, hardly any traffic. Strong 4G signal!

name: Vonkka
description: Nice location by a lake. Clean ablutions. Large parking for RV’s. Some space for tents. Also wooden cabins available, 25 eur for a small one. Resto has simple (frozen) meals.

name: Out in the woods
description: Beautiful spot in the forest. 8 km west of E75. Very quiet at night and very peaceful. No facilities. Shopping center 8 km away next to E75.

name: Free Water & Shower at Shell
description: At the Shell gaz station you can fuell up your watertanks (look for 'Vesi' in the glas box). You can also have a free shower and sauna if you ask at the counter in the restaurant.

name: Ounasjoki River Camp
description: Flat spot directly at the river. With a hide, fireplace with free firewood, pit toilets

name: Taalovaara Laavu
description: Nice so called 'Laavu' (shelter, fireplace, free firewood, pit toilet) directly on the shore of river Ounasjoki. Quiet place. Space for 2 - 3 vehicles.

name: Kemi harbour parking
description: nice parking lot in front office Baltic sea. bar and restaurant around. very quiet on winter...

name: Back street parking
description: Parking area for army practice air strip. So we were told by the local for forest worker

name: Lake view camp
description: Quiet position away from main road. Campfire is also available and rubbish bin.

name: Lakeside
description: Nice place next to lake. Just far enough off the road

name: 24 Hour Laundry and good food supermarket
description: Prism supermarket and 24 hour Laundry  both very good

name: Waterfront Helsinki
description:
Great position right on the waterfront 
Close to the city

name: Lakeside Camping
description: Great parking area near lake with sandy beach. Away from traffic. Drop toilets close by.

name: Vikaköngäs
description: Public parking area.  Many great hiking trails start from here.  On the banks of a river. Very nice grill area.

name: Kouvola Beach
description: Parking at a bathing place with very nice shore.  The parking lot is about 50 m from the water and lies in a forest.  Thus, there is no direct view to the lake.  We stood here very quiet, with just a few people walking their dogs.  Toilets are available.

name: E92
description: Parking next to a lake. Very quiet. Beautiful area.

name: Pudasjarvi
description: This is parking at a beautiful wooden church from 1761.  Close to a museum depicting an old settlement.  Very peaceful here.

name: Kaijaluoto
description:
Nice spot to next to the water.
Area is for putting boats to the water, next to the road. Able to fit caravan or car easily.
The Finnish text says: Do not wash your vehicles here.

name: Restaurang Marinas
description:
Great place for food and a beer. Grilled food, Pizza, Burgers. By the lake with great scenery in this small village. The place also offers accommodation complete with sauna. A great place to stop off if its on your route. 

http://www.restaurang-marinas.fi/

name: Kovalan uimaranta
description: Great sunset beach near the lake with toilet, changing room, fire place and benches also with some swings for kids and water available. There is also small ponton pier for bathing. Very great place on peninsula for camping. Quite busy with locas as they use as a beach during a day.

name: Mossala Island Resort
description:
One of the few Campgrounds of you take the Ring Road on the Archipilago.
There is an area for tents (we stood there with our VW Bus) without electricity, an area for larger RVs and you are able to Rent cabins.
The ferry leaves directly at the campground.
You May Rent kayaks, SUPs or fishing boats.
There is a Little hike around the area. Tent area 20 EUR without electricity and sauna. RV area 30 EUR incl. the above.

name: Parking Lot Isojärvi National Park
description:
Huge parking lot in the beginning of a national park. The ground is even.
Café, Pit toilets and water well close by.
At the Café you may rent kayaks, pack rafts and fat bike. A lot of hiking trails and a nice fat bike track start here.

name: Vaasan Autopaikka
description: Workshop for car service, oil change, lubrication. Very fast, efficient and reasonably priced lubrication service for my Landcruiser. Recommended!

name: Camping Sumiainen
description:
Nice campground on a lake inside a forest. Electricity is not available everywhere. It was pretty full when we visited, I guess it was because of midsummer.
Boats for rent
This place offers a Finnish sauna.
We paid 15 EUR per night (VW Bus, 2 adults, Baby, no electricity)

name: Koirasalmi
description:
This visitor center of the Salamajärvi national park offers pitches with and without electricity.
There are four areas to camp. Outhouse at lake Heikinlampi was okay, the other areas are said to have better ones. Showers are available at the main building.
The lakes are stocked with trout but you need to pay an additional fee to fish.
Koirasalmi offers rental huts and rooms as well.
We paid 13 EUR per night with our VW Bus and 2 adults / 1 baby.

name: Lakeside Camping
description:
Quiet place at a lake. There are literally dozens of spots around the lake where you can park your vehicle. Some spots may require 4x4 though.
There is a Public Beach with chemical toilets about 300 m from this spot.
Most of the roads are sandy.

name: 4x4parts
description: Garage selling parts for off-road cars... I just bought some oil but they were working on a Defender in the garage. See photo for business card.

name: River Camping
description:
Huge Area next to rapids of the river Kostonjoki. If you go to the end of the area you are not visible from the Main Street. When we stayed there, some wood was waiting to be transported (as you can see on google Maps).
If you take a little walk downstream another creek merges into the river and this is a perfect spot for fishing.
The water flows rather fast, we managed to get a  bath anyway.
4G available (Telia)

name: Rääpsyjärvi Beach
description:
Gravel Parking below a street directly at the beach.
Small sandy beach. Great place to take a swim.
4g available.

name: Parking at the lake
description: Calm parking at the lake. Next to tennis courts.

name: Kemijärvi wildcamp
description:
Big, flat gravel area. Boat Ramp available.
There is more Space available if you go south from this point (gravel road).
You get here by taking a gravel road from E63 at the big antenna. Path is okay, maybe a little bit too narrow for huge vehicles.
Noise from the Road, but okay during the night.
4g available

name: Otsamo Hiking Parking Area
description:
Small parking area without any services but loneliness (and mosquitoes).
Track to this place is a little bit bumpy but okay.
The track might be too narrow for bigger rigs.
Mobile Internet varies from edge to 4g

name: Small beach by road
description:
This is a little beach just off the road, not a formal camp site or a wild site. There is a bench, a fire pit, changing rooms and toilets. 
The road was not very busy during our stay, didn’t bother us. 
Possible that this place gets used by the locals (houses around) during July and August. 
Nice view over the water.
Swimming possible.
Sign says no dogs.

name: Showers, food, drink at Kolin Ryynänen
description: Used shower here for 2.50euro pp. Very friendly.

name: Väransbyn leirintäalue
description:
Natural park area with shelters and free firewood. Pit toilets and well water.
Really nice and peaceful.

name: Sysmä road
description: Nice flat area for few vehicles, Small trail leads to the lake. Some noise comes from the road.

name: Valko mustajärvi
description: Nice place by the lake. Timber for campfire available.

name: Äijäkoski
description: Large paved parking area next to the river. Large stack of firewood and a shelter with toilet a few hundred meters down the path on the river.

name: Kota
description:
Kota near the easternmost point of Finland. Really nice spot next to lake.
It has small cottage and fireplace open for all.
Rigs or cars can be left next to the road.
There is a well but not sure of it.

name: Jakkusuvanto Laavu
description:
Nice spot next to the river.
Has a fire place and alot of fire wood.
Quite close to the locals housings so try to keep it down.
Please clean after yourself.

name: Notvikstornet
description: Parking place by old tower near Bomarsund

name: Lemmenjoki camping and cabins
description: campsite by a lake and national park. tents €10(+2/shower), cabins 29, rooms also.

name: nice place by campfire
description: nice place to sleep in woods. you have also place to set campfire here. and a lot of reindeers😀

name: Grännäs Camping
description: Relly nice campground direct at the lake/sea. Private floating sauna for 25Euro/h. We paid 32Euro/night (2+van+dog) without electricity. Everything was perfect clean.

name: Mussalo Camping
description: Big and nice camping direct at the lake/sea. Free sauna from 6pm to 9pm. Very friendly staff! Everything was clean. Big kitchen and living area. 20Euro/night (4+tent+van+dog). Best sauna we had so far. Recommended!

name: Turku Overnight
description: Good locatet parking lot. Free parking (12h) with parking disc. Weekend without destiction. At weekend a little bit noisy at night because of party people are going home:-) Public toilet nearby (60.444233, 22.25281)

name: Free Ex-Camping
description: This area was a campground a few years ago. Pit toilet and grill hut are old but usable. Access to swim area (track nearby grill hut). Local guy told us that it is no problem to stay here. We had a great evening/night.

name: Siikaranta Camping
description: Big and nice campground. There are several spots at the sea and in the forest. Washing machine 5Euro. We paid 20Euro/night (van+tent+dog+4). Sauna is not included:-( Good pressured showers:-)

name: Seaside Parking
description: Big and nice parking lot direct at the sea/lake. Sandy beach. Perfect for a night. You can go the gravel road more further for a better swim access.

name: Free camp and park area
description: Big area with several spots at the sea/lake. There is also a grill hut with fire wood next to the parking. It belongs to the national park with 3 other spots with more facilities (pit toilet, sauna, ...) Check the map at the parking lot. Camping is officially allowed :-)

name: Rauhalahti Camping
description: Large established camp site for all. Including RV.

name: Lake Parking Lot
description: Big parking lot direct at the lake. Small sandy beach and forest. Good for a night. Windy:-( Very good sauna for 2Euro/person in 2km (61.0742915, 22.2434470). Enjoy!

name: Kallionokka Camping
description: Huge campground with included sauna direct at the lake. Big grasy area and playground with trampoline. 13Euro/night (van+tent+4+dog), washing machine/dryer 1Euro. Recommended!

name: Aura Clubarea
description: This area belongs to a community named aura. Very friendly people! You can camp at this place next to the flagpole. Big picnic area next to it. We had to pay 5Euro/night (4+dog+tent+van) and it includes the sauna (60.742486, 22.411431) which is open from 4 to 9pm. You have to pay next to the sauna while opening hours. Highly recommended!

name: Full Moon Sauna Night
description: Perfect spot next to turku. Sauna with showers for 2Euro next to the kiosk. Ask at the friendly kiosk owner for the best place. He opened us a barrier for a lovely place. We spent two perfect and free nights here.

name: On the lake - 1 km off the msin road
description:
Big Beautiful spot on the lake, quiet.
Place for 1-4 véhicules

name: Vika firehouse
description: A beautiful place next to the lake with a coverd fireplace and firewood. Please keep it clean. this is a very nice spot.

name: Lysholmen close to Dalsbruk
description: A very calm place suiting all vehicles, in the direct priximity to the sea

name: Nice place to stay
description: Nice quiet place to stay for a night or two. Great walking tracks, there is also a fire place but no other services.

name: Ala-Vuokki strand
description: A beautiful place next to a fireplace and dry toilets and a beach. Behind the cottage there is enough firewood. It is very quiet and you have a beautiful view over the lake.

name: water at Seo petrol station
description: drinking water available for 1€ per fillup. Hose is a bit short.

name: Absolute serenity
description: Total peace and quiet. This place is in a forest  next to a lake. There is also a fire place, fishing should be good also I never tried it. A great place for swimming also. There are no services here just peace and quiet.

name: Sääskenniemen takkatupa
description: A campspot with a beach, fireplace and dry toilets. It is here very quiet and beautiful surrounding.

name: Joensuu sani station
description: Here you can dump your black and gray water and fill the tank with fresh drinking water.

name: In the forest by the lake
description: This is another one of our favorite places. We stayed here for a couple of nights without any problems.  Very quiet no traffic nearby. There is also a undercover area with a great fireplace and firewood supplied by the local community. No other services are provided.

name: Luost visitor center
description: big parking close to city, can get busy during season. Pit toilets at 50m to the right on the walking path (at Picknick  area). 2,7KM hike around  the  lake,  by trolley or weelchair possible. Cafe across the street. Not the best spot, but can be convenient.

name: Hunt informal camp
description:
Nice place in forest and near the lake .
fire place and toilet

name: Harjumaa
description: A nice parking spot next to a lake. you have a beautiful view over the lake. There is also a firepit with bench and a dry toilet.

name: water
description: free drinking water, brown water disposal (only canister) , garbage disposal. Next to camping place. Picknik  table with rain cover and fire place here. No overnight possible.

name: peurasuvanto
description: next to a road but lays behind the trees . near by water. relaxt atmosphere. the road to this parking is bit further than the parking lot and verry small

name: Near Fferry
description:
the place is good for one night to sleep in the car. you could put your tent up in the woods too.
easy accasible by any vehicle, just next to the street.
some waste laying around, fishers have stored some of their stuff here. quiet at night, in the early morning, ferry came by and you probably get awake - earth and car is shaking. in total good Spot for one night.

name: Uimaranta
description:
nice camp with closed fireplace, woodshed, few changing rooms and a pit toilet. 

you cannot drive right up to the place. on the larger road nearby is a small parking spot for 2-3 RV's and then you have to walk the the rest of the way.

name: Parking at the lake
description: A small gravel and grass parking at the lake shore just outside of Lohja. No facilities but swimming possible at the beach. Very quiet.

name: Finbo Cargo check in
description: Check in for Eckerö Line Finbo Cargo to Muuga harbour just east of Tallinn. This is the cheapest option to travel with a vehicle between Finland and Estonia. Very easy access, no need to go to the busy western harbour in Helsinki.

name: Canal Ovari
description: Nice place with Nice view over a canal near the village Ovari. Close to a quiet road/bridge. No facilities. Good spot to go for a swim in the canal. In Ovari it is possible to rent canoes, kayaks, boats, etc.

name: Raatikkasaari beach
description: Fantastic sand beach on an island near Ähtäri. Beach is long and there's a turning place/parking at the end of a sandy road. Very quiet during evenings but can be popular if it's a nice summer day.

name: Karhulammenlaavu
description: A fireplace and some cover. Gravel road. At least good for cooking.

name: Spot at the beginning of a track
description:
Parking spot at the beginning of a Kolvananuuro track. Peaceful place in the middle of the woods. Room for at least five to eight cars.

Might be hard to reach with a large car or a trailer. We made our way with a van okay. Road has signs to the spot "Kolvananuuro".

fireplace 0,7km away (hiking) with a outdoor toilet. The track is very steep, but it has some ropes in the most challenging bits. 

In the bottom of the track it has a beautiful pond, which you can circle.

The track has some other parking spots, so they might be worth a visit as well.

Probably not available during winter.

name: Pello info
description: a little grill and parking place next to the river

name: E8 escape
description:
Off the E8 between the border to Sweden and the road to Norway.
Nothing but trees and fire rings.

name: quiet small harbour in green
description:
Next to the small harbour there are multiple options to set up camp. Big gravel parking space. 

We stayed slightly hidden behind the trailer parking next to forest, this is not accessable when very wet. 

We had a nice view on the forest, the harbour and the sea. It was very quiet all the time. Very fiew boats were coming and leaving.

name: Beach recreation area Kalajoen
description: long big sand-beach area with dunes, flat water and a lot of camp grounds.Nice to walk along the dunes/beach. It s a big recreation area with all facilities.

name: sand swimming beach near Forest
description:
A small sand beach with flat water area in a small bay with a nice view. With toilet, tables, fireplace and changing rooms. Used by locals for swimming, but quiet in the green.
About five vans would fit comfortly at the parking ground.

A small harbour is around the corner. There is even more parking space.

name: Bbeach at Lake Pikku Rahajärvi
description:
Beautiful place at a quiet lake. Sandy beach access to the water, nice for swimming. Place is half open/in the forest with view onto an island and the lake.
A dirt roads leads to this small place.

name: bears Cave-walking&cafe
description:
There is a big rock with a small cave inside. A easy short walk up to see the rock and the lake. (30 min in total) some educational signs to the forest.
There is a Café and nice souvenirs shop.

name: North of the European union
description:
Close to the northern most place of the European union.
You turn on a gravel road and from this are some secluded places reachable some might be big rig capable.
No service, no toilet, no garbage...
Weak mobile signal

name: Lakeside Stop
description:
A place on the shore of torsa lake.
Pit toilet and a fireplace with a roof, some firewood. 
Lake is good for swimming, changing room available.

name: Far end of Flakanäs
description: Continue all the way on the dirt road to find a secluded spot. Next to a cabin but they seem to be away lot of the time. No amenities but a nice spot for motorcycles and tent close to the water.

name: roadside reststop
description: Rest stop with toilet (pit) a parking lot (room for 2-3 regular rv's) 2 big wooden tables and benches with stone fire pit. Not much traffic and near water for a swim close by.

name: Yläköngäs
description: a nice place between the river and the road. A lot of places for tents and CV 's.

name: Kuusamon Erämajoitus - Pukari Old Border Station
description:
Old border station turned to a hostel kind of rentable accomodation. 800 meters from the border zone to Russia. Two buildings. Several rooms. Bigger house for larger groups. Smaller house has three separate units, all with own 
kitchen and showers and SAUNA!

name: Möhkön Manta Cafe
description: Pretty cool cafe in an old boat. Worth a stop.

name: Öykkösenvaaran battle zone
description: Interesting memorial of an actual battle zone from WW2.

name: Woods
description:
4wd only! Not sure if very
big rigs will fit in the narrow road. Google will stop at any point, just follow the forest road. You will have to go to the end as there is no possibility to turn around. At the end there is a flat area  where you can camp and turn around. A 3-minute walk from there is a shelter with pit toilet and firewood.

very quiet.no light pollution, good for star photography and watching the northern lights.

name: 24 Pesula
description:
Laundromat, card payment only.
Shopping center is open 08.00-21.00

name: Kirkkopuron ranta
description: Beautiful place next to the river. Water potable but still recommend to boil or sterilized before drinking. Place for two campers. No facilities.

name: Lamminranta Beach
description: Public beach. Secluded and small. Very nice sunsets in the evening. Small float bridge and pretty shallow nice and clear water

name: Kalkkoaivi (mountain)
description: Amazing moto or 4x4 destination for camping or just for views. Nice free community cabin at the top where you're allowed to make a fire, cook and relax. Non-motorized visitors are allowed to stay overnight in the cabin. Overlanders can just camp at the yard. Small lake next to it for water. Don't miss this little off road gem and enjoy!

name: Kovalan camping
description: Next to the lake, under pine trees. Private. Possible to swim, public sand beach with toilets and bbq place is close by. Beautiful sunset.

name: Majavajoki rest area
description: A nice spot next to road 78 bridge crossing river Simo. Suitable for RVs and tents. A sandy beach and some tables.

name: Alaköngäs
description:
A small gravel/grass area maybe 100 meters from the road. There's a post box for a voluntary payment. Enough space for maybe 5-6 rv's. Also suitable for tents.

Right on the river bend.

name: Skarpnatö dirt road spot
description:
Right on the dirt road from the outlook tower parking. Very quiet.
2 or 3 spots around this position.
High clearance recommend because to get into the spots are bumpy.

name: Leipikoski laavu
description: A nice laavu (5 walls, 1 side open) with benches and a fireplace. The river is close. Vehicles need to be parked a bit further away.

name: Motelli Rovaniemi
description: Cheap motel outside of Santa Claus town. Good wifi, equipped kitchen in room, nice and helpful staff speaking good English. Reception can be closed in the morning, but they answer the phone. I stopped there on the way to the Nordkapp. Can recommend.

name: Västergatan Roadside Camp
description:
right on the Västergatan dirt road.
space for 2 to 3 small rigs. Spots are on rocks (high clearance recommend) and spot at passing place.
Parking area of Langbergen hiking trail is close by.

name: Björkudden
description: Public beach approx. 2km out of the town centre. 2 table bench combinations to sit and prepare food. Changing cabins and a small playground.

name: Vikstrand
description: Public beach with toilet, playground and a bench/table combination.

name: Eckerö Camping & Stugor
description:
Camping ground with a lot of space.
Very friendly and helpful team.
Discount with different campingcards. 
Quiet.

name: Viimeinen Vartio
description: A nicely renovated old border station. Very near the border zone to Russia. Has a couple of self-catering apartments downstairs that are spacious and clean with all amenities. Beautiful, renovated sauna. Pretty affordable.

name: Karhu-Kuusamo Oy/Bear Kuusamo Ltd
description:
Bear watching hides in the bush. You can spend an evening or the whole night in a cozy hide in the forest, watching and photographing the brown bears (Ursus Arctos) during the summer months (between May-Sep). Please reserve your evening beforehand via the website; karhujenkatselu.fi or by calling. 
Amazing experience! This is the northernmost place of bear photography hides in Finland! A place not to miss!

name: Quiet spot in the forest
description: You need to get off the gravel and at the end of the trail you have a spot with campfire. The lake is close, yet hard to access due to the vegetation. Mosquitos are cruel, so have your repellents. Make sure you leave some firewood gathered for  the next camper!

name: Puutteenkylä KO
description: A nice shelter right next to the road with fireplace, firewood, benches, and electricity! Please make sure you leave it clean.

name: Fresh Fish "Fina Fisken"
description:
Fresh local fish, wraps and Sushi.
open
Monday - Friday 9am - 6pm
Saturday 10am - 15qm

name: Side street of Kuggviksvägen
description: The spot is at the end of a dirt road used by lumberjacks. Space for 2 to 3 small rigs. Quiet and leveled.

name: Marina Hamnsundet
description:
TOP place, cleanest laundry ever.
New and VERY clean restrooms, showers, kitchen and laundry. WiFi and Sauna. Overnight at parking lot. Pay at the Kiosk 10,- Euro for everything except Sauna, opening hours 03.00pm to 08.00pm. 
Very friendly host. Kiosk offers small meals and drinks.

name: Nice parking with toilets and BBQ close to lake
description: A nice spot where is possible to camp for free with tents or vans. It’s in the deep forest. Free dry toilets available. Free BBQ available in front of the lake. One of the best spot I ever seen.

name: Sodankyla north
description: A nice place next to a water between the E75 and a pedestrian road. Sandy ground and trees. Good spots for rv's and tents.

name: Germundö Alpin parking lot
description:
Overnight parking at Skiarea Germundö Alpin.
Not the nicest place but good for a night.
A lot of space.

name: Parking spot at Bridge to Vardö
description:
Paved parking spot right by the street to Vardö. Stay for max. 24 hours is allowed.
Traffic when a ferry arrived. Good for a night.
Space for 5 Big rigs and many Vans. Not all are leveld.
Bench with tables, Pit toilette and waste bin.

name: Nationalpark
description: There are some places for mobile homes beside a Café. From here you can make several different trails in the park. You can use an old fashend sauna next the lake. The owner of the Café are very friendly and you can buy mushrooms or self made cake.

name: Rastilla Campimg, Helsinki
description: Good Place to discover Helsinki or a last stop before taking a ferry to Estland

name: Hidden in the forest
description: Nice place hidden in the forest  close from main road, place for 2 campers. No GSM signal at all here !!! Enjoy silence and wilderness !

name: Panorama - river
description: Panorama for river, spot elevated about 20m above river, not possible to go down, but this place has very nice view.  GSM signal very weak, no internet (sometimes 2G).

name: Riverside
description: At the river, good access road, flat, fireplace, good for big cars or long trailer too !

name: Riverside Ounasjoki
description: At the river Ounadjoki, nice place with benches, fireplace and pit toilet. There is also shelter which is half open in case of rain.

name: Kettujoki river
description: Close to Inari. Very nice spot at the shore of the river in the forest. No services but a fire pit

name: Päihäniemi beach
description: Recreation area with firepits, firewood, pit toilets. Very nice and quiet place. Camping allowed. Also good starting point for boat tours. Full LTE.

name: Shelter by the lake
description: Big shelter by the lake for public use, fire pit and wood available. The shelter has table and benches. there is space for two tents

name: Near Kuusikijoki river
description:
Superb place with several spots nearby the river. Fire pits available with free cut wood. Dry toilets but no water.
Nice place for river fishing

name: Laundromat at city21 mall
description:
Inside the mall close to Hesburger, the laundromat with professional machines and dryers is named”24 Pesula”
Excellent service

name: Hipajärvi Laavu
description: Laavu (small shelter) with fireplace, firewood and pit toilet. very nice view over the lake. Mifht be good for swimming. Very quiet.

name: Koverrusjärvi
description: Newish facilities by a lake: firepits (firewood available), toilets and a lean-to. Suitable fpr big rigs. Local fishermen use this spot.

name: Kuntojärven venesatama
description: Boat dock just off tarred Vuotungintie, only suitable for small campers. No toilet, only a fire place by a lake. Used by local fishermen.

name: Livohka Campsite & Holiday Center
description: Campsite with electricity  30€ / night (per a car, as many persons as you wish). Tent site 15€ / night. Free use of rowing boats & firewood available. Sauna as well.

name: Kellinniemi - Wild Camp with facilities by a lake
description: Amazing spot by a lake! Toilet, free firewood, sandy beach - perfect for relaxing. Lots of Finns camping during the summer, though, and locals swimming. Look for Kellinniemi sign by the tar road and then it’s a sandy road leading there, no 4x4 needed.

name: Pohjolan Pirtti
description: Atmospheric summer & winter cafe in an old Finnish farm house. Tasty food and you can order a true Finnish sauna experience in three different saunas. Check their opening times beforehand. Very friendly owners, can also tell you interesting stories about the history of the place.

name: Lijoki
description:
Parking for a small national park. Good for any vehicle. Ample room for up to 6 vehicles. Easy access. If you walk the route into the park you will find a fire place ( if you keep left).
Good starting point for a canoe trip too.

name: Teboil truck
description: Water and dump station for black waters . Water is free

name: Spot at the river
description: Nice spacious place next to the river. Suitable for rigs too

name: Rest area by the lake
description: Roofed area with bench on a wood platform. There is space for a tent or two. It’s open on the four walls but it does offer a fair protection from dew and rain if it’s not too windy.

name: Public park
description: Great place to camp (on my map app looks like a public camping area but being off season not too sure) with tables and benches for picnic. There’s a big public shelter with plenty of space for tents in bad weather.

name: Möckelö Havsbad East
description:
Spot with view of Mariehamn harbor. Beach within walking distance.
Width limited by gate poles

name: Lilla holmen latrintömning
description: free dump station. open 24/7 every month of the year

name: ABC truck stop
description:
There is electricity for 5€/24hrs. Get the key in the huge ABC truckstop. 24hours parking is 10€/vehicle.
Very clean toilets!
For shower walk over to Shell.

name: Nomadicnaali.com
description:
Single parking space with terrace and lake view in the wilderness / husky camp. Write to us anytime - even spontaneously. Choice of pitch: with or without Finnish lake sauna. Additional offers such as hot-pot or husky experiences (hikes, horse-drawn carriage rides) for a surcharge. Nestled between blueberry-covered hills and birch forests, on our own crystal-clear lake, without neighbors. The nearest shop is about 10 minutes away by car. There is only one outdoor toilet. Shower / washing facilities in the lake sauna. Dogs are welcome at no extra charge. Refill fresh water, gray and black water disposal and electricity free of charge (included in the pitch).
21.- without Sauna
35.- with Sauna

name: Lakeside
description: Parking at an Place at See Site.Quiet and charming.

name: Taikayo Camping
description: This is a nice campground on a large lake. When I was there in early June 2022 I was the only tent. Most of the guests are in RVs. All the amenities are provided. A tent site was10 Euros per night. A well run campground in a nice setting, operated by nice people.  They also rent cabins but I did not get a price.

name: cosy camping side at lake
description: really nice place by lakeside, no facilities

name: Sandy playground
description: Nice spot right next to a dirt road. However extremely quiet - not a single vehicle has passed the whole night + next morning. Sunlight in the evening and some shade in the morning. Only very few moskitos that time of the year.

name: Quiet wild camp just off the road. On TET track
description: Just off the road, there is room for tents, vans etc. Caravan might be tricky to turn around though. No facilities or water but a good place to spend a night. Level ground can be found for a tent or two. Good for TET riders

name: Kota at beatifull lake
description: A nice place to stay with toilet and fireplace. A good Kota, where you can spend the night, when it rains

name: Leskelä
description: Next to the monument of Finland's metric centrum is a beautiful field, owned by the community of Leskelä. With permission you can place your tent beautifully.

name: Quite place by the lake
description: Nice spot near the lake. Also a spot to let boats into the water. Around 10km of gravel road leads you to this spot but it’s worth it

name: Camping at the lake
description: wonderful place at the beach with toilet and other facilities.

name: Lohiniva bbq place
description: Nice place along the Ounasjoki where you can put your tent. Fireplace, toilet and reindeer strolling around. And a huge swimming pool!

name: fresh water directly from source
description: Fresh potable water directly from source. Very tasty and cold! It's easy to miss the source, if coming from the E75, the source is on the left side of the road. Look for the wooden sign that states "Lädhe".

name: Clearing near Lake
description:
This is a beautiful place for vans, tents, also maybe for camping cars. For one vehicle. very quiet , you can go swimming.
There are dry toilets. the GPS point is the beginning of the access road that could be a little slippery by rainy weather.

name: Nice place in the woods near Salmivaara
description: Nice flat gravel place in the woods. Very quiet. Accessible over gravel road in good condition. Only 3G network available.

name: Ruijan  reitti trailhead parking
description: Large paved lot with at least a dozen spots.  No "no overnight" signs. Lots of hiking. No facilities but very quiet at night, even during the day not too much traffic.  4G signal. We went up to the road to the smoke sauna at Kiilpaa (E15 pp including showers) at 3 then came here for the night.

name: Pajakka
description: Place where you can get water for free. Also possibility to empty tank.

name: Shell Trucker stop
description: Full-service station with dump station, water and you can park overnight. Good petrol price too when we were here. Restaurant, shop and free showers.  To dump go to the back of the station and there's a yellow sign in front of a manhole cover.  Go inside and ask for the "key" (hook).  No rinse water tho.  Bottled gas service available.

name: artic laundry
description: If you are looking for washing, it is a Real good place. There is free parking, coffre and Wifi. You can take a shower for 3euros too. The reception staff is vert welcoming.

name: Lake view campsite
description: Nice place for a picnic or a sleepover. Directly to the shore of a big lake. Very quiet. Only accessible by 4wd or feet/ cycle. Enough space for at least 4 campers and several tents.

name: Fagerö Simstrand
description: Parking place next to the old Fagerö Volkspark and bathing place. Lovely spot with lots of birds and a small harbour. A bathing place with cold shower and toilet. A small Restaurant is also situated here. We were here with 4 other camper vans. Very quiet and peaceful, a few people with boats.

name: Little bathing place near Dam
description: Small bathing place north of river with place for 1 or 2 campers or tents. There is a somewhat run down wooden rain shelter with fireplace, nothing else. Be aware: also a fair amount of muskitoes. We stayed here for a night before going to the Stone Age Park down the road. Very quiet and private.

name: Rest area on road 78
description: Nicely kept new rest area just off the road. Toilets, garbage cans, covered picknick table and asphalt parking space. Road close but relatively little traffic. Walking path starts here.

name: Parking place Nature Centre
description: We stayed a night at this parking place. Nothing here, but quiet at night. A few campers overnight. Ok for a quick stopover, nothing special.

name: EMC Motorcycle Workshop
description:
Big Motorcacyle dealership (BMW, Harley, Kawasaki, Yamaha, loads of others) with workshop.
they squeezed us in for a tire change without an appointment. They probably have alle the tools and most spare parts.
The guy at the counter spoke English.

name: Beautiful camping at lake
description:
Small Beach with a boat ramp and a small bridge where boats are tied. (clean) pit toilet and a small, locked hut.

Awesome view over the lake and the sunset, very private at Sunday evening, locals use it on weekdays and the weekend, probably.

Big rigs will fit on the spot easily, the road leading there should also be fine
Dirt road and gravel for the last part, easy drive for any vehicle.

name: Near the beach
description: Nice spot near a small lake and beach. Not supposed to park on the beach but there is a trail going behind the beach. soft 4x4 needed.

name: Kaktsvarrin Eramajat
description:
Beautiful & quiet campground by the lake.  There are cottages too. Paid EUR40 (one person) for cottage, (double is EUR60). Motorhome parking paid EUR15. Shared shower & toilet. Shower is free. Washing machine EUR10. There is a small kitchen with stove, electric kettle & fridge but you hv to bring
 yr own pot, pan & cutleries. There is also a sauna, FOC. You can go fishing at the lake if you like. The owner, Olavi is very friendly.

name: K Market Harkonen
description: Entering Norway, u can change money inside this supermarket. Open 9am - 8pm. The rate is not so good (EUR1 = NOK9.50) but there is no other place to change unless you find an ATM at Karasjok. There is also a 24hrs Shell here where u can put petrol for cheaper price compared to Norway.

name: Lakeside
description: Quiet place next to the lake. Swimming is possible, but the water is not inviting. A lot of wildlife around. You can find the gravel road on Google satellite view (it doesn't exist on the map, but it has pretty good quality). The road goes straight to the water. Comfortable for 1 tent, but possible to put more.

name: Rivierside
description:
Beautiful flat camping pitch on the river Kitinen near a reservoir.
You can bathe here on a pebble beach and fish. There is a fish jetty, there is also a place where you can bbq. You have to take care of wood yourself.                         The place is very quiet .

name: Forrest Beach on lake Välijärvi
description: Beautiful place on the lake Välijärvi between the trees. There is a beach for swimming. There is a simple fire pit. fishing is possible in the lake. there is room for a maximum of 2 campers max size 7m.

name: Porkkala
description:
Free parking and legal fireplaces, free firewood. One toilet.
Free for visitors.

name: Mihkailijärvi
description: many spots for rigs to park and camp near the lake with fireplaces

name: Valkamanranta beach
description:
Good place for a tent or a camper with amazing sunsets.  There is a road going to the empty part of the beach, just follow the coordinates.
The beach is mostly shallow sandy, but you can swim.
Please be quiet and keep it clean!!!

name: Mini Beach
description: Small sandy clearing next to the river and the main road. Seems to be used as camping spot as we found a fir pit with fire wood. Reachable with all vehicles.

name: Rocks by the Sea
description: Nice campspot above the sea. You can get there by a path and it is only for tents!

name: Boat launching
description: Nice spot at a boat launching place between some summer houses next to a lake. Only for tent campers!

name: Auhjärvi Rest Stop
description: Nice parking and rest Spot next to the road and next to a nice lake.

name: Hunttijärvi Beach
description: Nice beach at a beautiful lake. A guy living close gave us the information about the place and told us that it is no problem to camp there.

name: Forest near Rovaniemi
description: Calm camping spot on forest road leading to open clear cut area with great privacy. Lake Tievanlampi is nearby. A lots of mosquitos in summer time.

name: Thank the lord
description:
Hello! So, my girlfriend and I are traveling via car all around Finland. We are sleeping in and camping with it. DURING WINTER!! When we checked Overlander there was ZERO spots up in the north of Finland which was WILD to us. SO, we decided to start making a few spots of our own :) 

Anyways, behind the church parking lot. Stayed for one night. No one here to ask.

Quite, a little bit of artificial light but not much else. 

Enjoy the free spot :)

name: vapo altoneva laavu
description: Small parking near a shelter, view tower and a fire pit. Beautiful place, very quiet.

name: Jutuaan polku
description:
parking in the forest on a dirt road.
start of the Jutuaan polku trail.

500 meters from it fire pit / shelter / toilets / hang bridge over the river.

quit at night, in day time locals who come to hike.

there is wood at the fire pit so bring some matches to get it burning.

name: parking in the forrest
description: parking in the forrest at the beginning of the wildernis church trail and other hike trails.

name: Savustamo Tunturikala Ky
description: Fantastic little restaurant serving smoked salmon and salted reindeer. Wonderful host. Lots of parking.

name: Spot by a small lake
description:
Very peaceful and beautiful spot on a small lake. There is a fireplace, but you need to bring your own firewood. Room for 2 smaller vehicles, with bigger rigs it might be bit tight. 

Road here is not too bad, but some clearance is needed. You can approach either from west or east. The road is usually passable also in the winter, but then you definitely need 4x4 with good clearance. 

There are no facilities. Please keep the place clean!

name: k market
description:
inside the k market left direct when you enter.

open till 21.00 hour.

name: large parking next to ski club
description:
Large parking. good for overnight. Not something special. But ok for exploring the town and overnight when you arrive late.

Not sure if the toilets are open but there is a sign on the back of the red building. Not sure if you can use electricity. There are poles that look like electric poles.

But I was here off-season. Friendly people around. They welcome you to their town.

name: Roadside
description:
It's a large open space next to the road. Some parts concrete, some sand gravel.

Quiet at night, I spent one night here.

Good for an overnight when you are tired and not looking for something fancy.

name: free camper place
description:
realy nice spot in the center of town but quit.

direct on the water front.

there is electricity but then you have to pay for it in the supermarket.

free water/toilets

suprising spot.

name: Waterside
description:
Allowed to stay 24 hours.
direct on the water.

Go to the left when you arrive.
you will see the sign, 24 hours stay.

The other parking areas are 4 hours with parking card.

nice trail to walk and southeast there is a walking bridge to get on the mainland/south Helsinki.

name: Lake Ulkujärvi
description:
Very quiet place in the middle of nowhere. With fire ring. 

Right at the water is a place for one camper, about ten meters up is space for another one. It's gravel ground, so maybe difficult for pitching a tent (we made it). 

The road was in a bad condition, so good clearance needed. When wet, 4wd might be helpful.

4G reception.

name: Hostel River
description: Hostel River.  a nice small hostel in the center of Pori. Private rooms mostly. Excellent kitchen, lounge area, laundry available. it is warm comfortable and clean.  There is parking yard and undercover parking for several motorcycles. Very friendly obliging owner. 1 person in a private room 60 euros.

name: Forest track
description: Turn off main road and follow dirt road for about half a mile to T junction, turn right onto disused forest track.  Several clearings in forest next to track and firm ground to park motorcycle.  Nice quiet spot in forest.

name: Spot by remote beach
description:
This place is located by quite remote swimming beach. There are few houses in the village, but in general very quiet and nice spot. Barely ever no one here.

By the beach there is a parking lot which can fit few campers/tents. In addition to the beach, there is a fire place (bring your own firewood), changing rooms and pit toilet. Road here is good condition gravel road.

name: Pikkumatolampi Fireplace
description: Nice and quiet place near water and old mining village.

name: Mustilan koulu
description: We at Mustilan koulu provide Camping spots. Shower, laundry and WiFi are available. In case you Plan a longer stay we can also arrange a guest room. Give us a short call before arrival to +358452038339

name: Laahtasen Leirintä ja Lomakylä
description:
Lovely lakeside camping site with cute log cottages. 
large and small cottages, small was 40 euro per night. 
Kitchen, outside fire place, sauna, row boats, lovely walks,

name: Loviisa camping
description:
Really lovely and tranquil campsite on the waterside. Fabulous facilities including lounge, kitchen and dining areas. Nice place to chill for a few days. 
20 minutes walk in to the small pretty town. 35euro for 2 nights 1 person in a tent.

name: Hotel Villa Vanessa
description: Budget Hotel. Single rooms + private bathrooms. Clean, simple, close to market and restaurants, secure parking - perfect for motorcycles. Outside door entrance motel style. Remote check-in available. In paid $33.

name: Guest House Matka-Talo
description:
Single rooms, shared bathrooms & kitchen. Very comfortable. Secure parking for vehicles. Perfect for motorcycles. Sauna included. Grocery store and bar/pub next door. Excellent budget accommodations for a night.
I paid $25/night - twin room.

name: Giellajohka
description: Budget single rooms, clean, shared bathrooms. Different types rooms available with private bathrooms. Sauna, lake, food available at restaurant. Friendly staff, secure parking. Perfect for a night while passing through. I paid €34/night.

name: Lake side fire camp
description:
A small lake side fireplace 15meters from the road.
Cars and trucks needs to be parked at the road and there is limited space to put up tent by the lake.
Amazing place to swim and cook but if you only have car accomodation then sleeping is done by the road.

name: The two lake campground
description:
great camping location with loads of space for all types of vehicles. 
Several fire pits available and easy access to the lake for swimming.

name: Puolanka Camping
description:
Nice little campground with complete kitchen, sauna, clean toilets and showers directly at a lake with a boat for the campers 
The owner is very nice and helpful. 25 € for two persons with 2 motorcycles and a tent for the night 
Lots of mosquitoes though

name: Hetan Kota
description:
Campground by a lake (means a lot of flies but not many mosquitos) with nice kitchen and sauna. Mostly rentable houses and spots for caravans, not optimal for tents but we found a good spot near the water.
Owner is very friendly and helpful. Little shop with souvenirs and selfmade stuff.
20 € for 2 persons/2 motorbikes/1 tent

name: Luhtalampi Lake campground
description:
Beautiful camping ground next to a lake.
several fire pits available and a Kota with fireplace. 
well maintained with pit toilet and firewood available. 
easy access for swimming.

name: Tetrijärvi Cabin
description:
A cottage in the woods that can be rented.
beautiful location by the lake Tetrijärvi.

name: Quiet Parking near a lake
description: If you want to visit the Santa village or Rovaniemi this is a great and very quiet place to sleep. 100m away there is a nice swimming lake and a playground. Also some hiking trails are starting here.

name: Karnaistenkorpeen
description:
Perfect spot close to Helsinki. 

Perfect for a lunch break or overnight stay. In the middle of the forest. 
Stay with your Car on the Parking lot (you will be alone) or:
Walk 1.1 km and you are at a forest lake and a cabin where you can make a fire. Go another 800 and you will come to a new cabin and lake. It's so nice in the land of 1000 lakes.

name: Lake Niskalahti
description: Great wild camp spot next to a lake, suitable for campervans, tents and hammocks. Swimming possible as well.

name: middle in the woods
description: Go off the gravel road, there is a path into the forest. We drove there till it was not going any further. Easy for tents and smaller campers should be fine too.

name: at the lake in middle of nowhere
description: On your way to the easternmost point in Finland, you will find this place. Super quiet. Small fireplace around. But no internet connection. We had a lovely night.

name: Tampere beach
description: A small parking area next to a beach and ship port. Very quit and peaceful for an overnight.

name: into the woods
description: right next to the street in the woods. no gravel road.  reindeers around.

name: parking
description: right next to the street, is a parking spot. nobody around, even other cars are barely to see

name: Korttajärvi beach
description: Big quiet parking place near lake. Good swimmingplace, clean toilets.

name: Ruuhijärvi Beach
description: A small beach close to the lake near some changing room. Close to some houses but quiet even in the summer. One or two place top for small rigs. Some people on the evening or in the morning to go on swimming but quiet.

name: Offroadtarvike
description: Off-road garage, specialist in Toyota. They are very friendly and competent. They sell also parts and fluid.

name: Small Harbour next to the lake
description: A long straight gravel road goes to a tiny harbour. A big flat gravel space and a small one near a wood bench in front of the lake. Be careful to not park to close to the boat.

name: Taikarananntie
description: Nice place! Great for sleeping, swimming, grilling. Also for larger campers.

name: Laavu "Kalamäen" in wetlands
description:
Free to use Laavu, rough gravel road last bit, possible with 4x4 but no big rigs. Motorcycle/bike recommended. No amenities other than roofed shelter with table and benches, fire wood and natural water. No toilet and lots of mosquitoes! Locals live quite close by and often use trails for hikes. 
Many options for hiking the wetlands and also possible for wheelchairs to tour the area.

name: Boat Landing off 5/E63
description: Boat landing away from the road surrounded by lake on 3 sides.  Quiet and peaceful with reindeer walking through camp. Pit toilet.

name: Infobüro
description: The Underwood and the Passwords you will get at the Desk

name: Shelter beside resevoir
description: Shelter with firepit next to lake/resevoir. Close to road but quiet at night. Beach for swimming nearby, with toilet building. Water level in lake changes due to dam but always possible to refill.

name: Laavu shelter by the river
description: Quiet laavu shelter with drop toilets and firepit. Lots of firewood available. Place to fish and swim nearby.

name: Laavu beside bridge
description: Shelter with fire and picnic table. Toilet available. Very close to road, but little traffic after dark. Small jetty for boats. Possible to swim but not great.

name: Weather shelter Haukkavuoren luontopolku
description: There is parking for 15 cars, a fire place with wood, a weather shelter, roofed table and dry toilets. From here, 800m walk to nice views.

name: Huoltopalvelut Juutilainen Oy
description: A AD garage that help a lot for changing a siwel joints and bearing. The owner, Juhani, is really nice and helpful and ready to help for anything.

name: Roadside Laavu
description: Large laavu with fireplace close to the road. Little traffic at night. Firewood and drop toilet available. Water source available but must be boiled.

name: Lakeside spot off road 92
description: Quiet place to camp just off the quiet road 92 from Inari to Kirkenes. Good access to lake for water and swimming. Campfire spot from previous campers with plenty of firewood nearby.

name: Bikercamp Oijärvi
description: Motorcycle-friendly place to stay overnight

name: Nordmarket shop and cafe
description:
Shop with cafe and wifi close to Norway border. If travelling from
Finland Norway border side is first/last shop and service for 150km or so. Fuel and supermarket also.

name: Place by the river
description:
Nice Place by a River near the Road.
 
no Firewood

name: Hwy 4731 Lakeside
description: Beautiful small place, close to a lake, easy to reach, we have had a quiet stay and an amazing sunset

name: Osakeyhtiö Off-Road Paja
description: Anton is the owner of this amazing place, the only one in Finland and even in the Nordic countries that can provide all kind of parts for Land Rover (even Series One). Very friendly and there for helping. Don't hesitate to call him if your are in troubles.

name: Haapamäen Höyryveturipuisto
description: Campground in a Railway museum. You stand directly between old Steam locomotives. You can also sleep in a sleep wagon /RV. Nice area, also for kids.

name: Quiet spot near the lake
description: A small spot for tent or 4x4, next to the road. Some boats are waiting for their owners, for fishing. Lots of sun till the end of the day. A small path leads to the spot. It’s very quiet.

name: Small beach near Klamila
description: Small beach on a sea estuary, protected by high ferns but with beautiful view along the water. Jetty with swimming ladder. A dry toilet, two little changing rooms. 5G. Room for only a few cars. A bit further along the (blind) path are two more area’s for some cars, very beautiful but without any sea view.

name: Karkali Nature Reserve
description: Toilet, waste basket are near the parking lot. Nice hiking area with a few seat benches and a swimming spot.

name: Haukkalampi Big Parking Lot
description:
Parking lot in Nuuksio Nature Reservat. Big hiking area. A few hundred meters is a drinking water place, also campfires und a place to get coffee. Swimming is also possible in the near lake.
No toilets direct at this parking lot, you have to walk a few hundred meters.
There is an smaller parking lot for normal cars 200 meters away, there you can dumb your waste

name: Herkkujuustola Cheesemaker
description:
Here you can buy the best cheese in finland! Made from Peter Dörig a swiss cheesemaker! You also find a restaurant and can have a look of the cheesefactory! We really recommend a short Stopp! 
Big parking lot in front. No overnight stay!

name: Maisematie parking
description: Open year-round. Space for about 10 cars. By the main road so some noise, but not bad.

name: Ylläs Ski Resort
description:
Ylläsjärvi camping area

Often fully booked. You can still use grey water dump for a fee.

name: Ylläksen Ykkös Caravan
description: Fees apply. Camping area with services. Cellphone 5G.

name: Saivojärvi parking lot
description: Space for about 15 cars by crystal clear small lake.

name: Kesänkijärvi Parking Lot
description: Starting point for hiking trails. Somewhat popular. Space for 40 cars.

name: Gas station SEO Muonio
description: Gas station with toilets, dump station, restaurant etc.

name: Raanujärvi parking lot
description:
Don’t get irritated by the small one direct at the road. You have to drive down to the lake. Big flat area. There is a boat slipping point and one toilet on the other end.
Nice place for a night.

name: Komossaträsket lake spot
description:
Spot near a lake. Two Pit toilets.
Space for 3 vans. Good swimming spot.

name: Nurmijärvi
description: Municipal boat landing. Dry toilets. Open shelter. Fire ring with firewood. Covered picnic table.
